summary: The Jewish Cardinal tells the amazing true story of Jean-Marie Lustiger, the son of Polish-Jewish immigrants, who maintained his cultural identity as a Jew even after converting to ... See full summary »
cast: Laurent Lucas|Aurélien Recoing|Audrey Dana|Pascal Greggory|Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet|Alex Skarbek|Vincent Furic|Dan Gutman|Henri Guybet|Aurélien Heilbronn|Zbigniew Jankowski|Jean-Noël Martin|Nathalie Richard|Christophe Dimitri Réveille|Aude Saintier|Pascal Tantot|Bruno Todeschini
title: El cardenal judío
